00032 #include "GHOST_SystemNULL.h"
00033 
00034 class GHOST_SystemNULL;
00035 
00036 class GHOST_DisplayManagerNULL : public GHOST_DisplayManager
00037 {
00038 public:
00039     GHOST_DisplayManagerNULL( GHOST_SystemNULL *system ) : GHOST_DisplayManager(), m_system(system) { /* nop */ }
00040     GHOST_TSuccess getNumDisplays( GHOST_TUns8& numDisplays ) const { return GHOST_kFailure; }
00041     GHOST_TSuccess getNumDisplaySettings( GHOST_TUns8 display, GHOST_TInt32& numSettings ) const{  return GHOST_kFailure; }
00042     GHOST_TSuccess getDisplaySetting( GHOST_TUns8 display, GHOST_TInt32 index, GHOST_DisplaySetting& setting ) const { return GHOST_kFailure; }
00043     GHOST_TSuccess getCurrentDisplaySetting( GHOST_TUns8 display, GHOST_DisplaySetting& setting ) const { return getDisplaySetting(display,GHOST_TInt32(0),setting); }
00044     GHOST_TSuccess setCurrentDisplaySetting( GHOST_TUns8 display, const GHOST_DisplaySetting& setting ){ return GHOST_kSuccess; }
